{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Thomson |model=TG585 |revision=v7 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/03/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=RSE-TG585V7 |ic_id= |us_id=TMBDL01BTG585V7 |pwr_v=22 |pwr_amp=0.41 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6338;BCM6338KFBG, HS0817 P12, 867286 M1; |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032N90TFI04 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=DS1216AGTA-75-E |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RG0816 P11, 866787 1A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.37;6.5.17; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.9;; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [https://web.archive.org/web/20121228150432/http://www.technicolorbroadbandpartner.com/dsl-modems-gateways/products/product-detail.php?id=161 ''Technicolor'' product page] ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/thomson/tg585 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ([https://fccid.io/RSE-TG585V7 FCC ID]) ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=101182 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :The user mentioned no working ethernet or wifi. :.. however the switch might be supported according to: :[https://lists.openwrt.org/pipermail/openwrt-devel/2010-September/007892.html openwrt-devel mailing list] :Wi-Fi should be supported by [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/b43 '''b43'''] :"BCM4318 chipset: AP mode does not work because of packet loss :in high transmission rates. Hard to debug & fix." ([http://lists.infradead.org/pipermail/b43-dev/2011-December/002249.html solved?] [from [http://lists.infradead.org/pipermail/b43-dev/2012-May/002493.html here]]) ===Serial=== copied from ''ali1234'''s post on the above ''OpenWrt'' forums {{SCollapse|OpenWrt boot log |
